txt.en: Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.\n\nYour mission is to secure the Redhorn Pass.
Despite the failure of the Iron Garrison, the dwarves will not allow the Orcs of Khazad-dûm to spill forth into Azanulbizar, the Dimrill Dale.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath at Akrâz-zahar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'Our scouts in the Dimrill Dale have discovered a small band of Orcs and goblins camped upon the Redhorn Pass. I do not know if they mean to join with Gorgar and his ilk in Gundabad or simply harry the folk of the vales, but we cannot allow them to overrun the pass!

'You are to travel to the Dimrill Dale and secure the Redhorn Pass!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to secure the Redhorn Pass.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath and travel to the Dimrill Dale.
'Well done, [placeholder]!\n\n'I am pleased that the Redhorn Pass will remain clear of foes as we prepared to march on Gundabad once more!'
